ExtendedStorageExtended.blurb: This allows non-vanilla weapons to be stored, so long as they are categorized as WeaponsRanged or WeaponsMelee. This uses a complex intersection to achieve this w/o trying to patch against 9000+ mods and still allow vanilla weapons to be stored by default. Any non-vanilla wepons are not allowed by default in the filter and must be manually enabled in the Storage filter settings.
Cover and refrigeration must be provided by the immediate envirionment.
Cover and refrigeration must be provided by the immediate envirionment.
